synthesis_conditions.drying_method: soaked in fresh N,N0-dimethylformamide (DMF) overnight, collected by filtration, stored under acetone
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Oxygen-free conditions are necessary to prevent oxidation of VIII centers during the hydrothermal process.

oxidation_to_MFM-300(VIV).result: dark purple solid, stored under N2 in a glovebox

synthesis_conditions.note: MFM-300(VIV) is obtained by post-synthetic oxidation of MFM-300(VIII) and cannot be directly synthesized using VOSO4 or VO2 salts.

reduction_to_MFM-300(VIII).result: Partial decomposition of the framework occurs, quantitative reduction not achieved.

N2_adsorption.result: No significant adsorption uptake due to activation diffusion effect caused by narrow pore size.

MFM-300(VIII).uptake_capacity: 8.6 mmol g-1 at 273 K and 1.0 bar

MFM-300(VIV).uptake_capacity: 3.54 mmol g-1 at 298 K and 1.0 bar
